title: You know what games really need?
body:
You need to be able to see which champs you have gotten a chest with this season. 
{{champion:64}}  Cause I can't always see.
Seeing Masteries would be neat-o too.
"Oh, I haven't played this champ in a bit, might as well."

replies.body: Can't you view that in the champion section of your profile? There's a golden border around them.
